brand_identity.name: Ambica Diagnostic Center
brand_identity.primary_archetype: The Performance Pro (Medical Edition) - Precision & Clarity

primary.description: Deep Ocean Blue - Communicates authority and trust

secondary.description: Cyan/Teal - Represents wellness, technology, and hygiene

accent.description: Soft Cyan - For backgrounds and gentle highlights

layout_system.grid_strategy: Use Bento Grids for services/features. MODE A for marketing pages, MODE B for dashboard.

buttons.primary: bg-[#023E8A] hover:bg-[#002855] text-white rounded-lg px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-md hover:shadow-lg active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#023E8A] border border-[#023E8A] hover:bg-blue-50 rounded-lg px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-[#023E8A] hover:bg-blue-50/50 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-xl overflow-hidden

inputs.style: flex h-12 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-[#00B4D8] focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.style: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Hover states should lift elements slightly (-translate-y-1). Buttons should have active scale down.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for UI icons. Use 'phosphor-icons' (Duotone) for feature highlights.

hero_main.alt: Lab technician using microscope in modern diagnostic center

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL_DEPENDENCIES: npm install lucide-react framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot date-fns react-day-picker
THEME_SETUP: Ensure 'Plus Jakarta Sans' is imported in index.css from Google Fonts.
NAVIGATION: Create a sticky navbar with transparency that becomes solid white on scroll.
HERO_SECTION: Use a split layout. Text on left, large image on right (or vice versa). Add a 'Book Appointment' card floating over the image.
booking_logic: Implement the 6:00 AM - 8:30 AM specific slot logic carefully. Use a clear visual selector for time slots.
dashboard: The patient dashboard must be card-based (Bento Grid). 'Upcoming Appointments', 'Latest Reports', 'Payment History' should be the main widgets.
mobile_responsiveness: Ensure the booking form is easily usable on mobile (large touch targets, native inputs where appropriate).
accessibility: Ensure high contrast for text (slate-600/slate-900). Do not use light grey text on white backgrounds.
TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects sparingly but effectively (e.g., booking overlay).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
